title: Varus and his "Meta" Problems
body:
We all should know that Varus is at the moment in a more or less in weak spot but I think Riot should change it and I have some Ideas

Passive: INNATE: Varus gains 40% (+ 50% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds upon scoring champion kills or assists, reduced to 20%
(+ 25% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed on minion or monster kills.

INNATE: Varus gains 45% (+ 55% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds upon scoring champion kills or assists, reduced to 20%
(+ 25% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed on minion or monster kills.

Why this change to his passive : With that attack speed buff he can snowball in Teamfigths if Varus gets a Kill or Assist

Q Piercing Arrow : Add Bonus Armor Pen that would be nice for people who like playing Caster Varus Lvl 1 = 10 % and lvl 5 = 50% for example

W Blighted Quiver : Base Dmg down but AP Scaling up 6 / 10 / 14 / 18 / 22 (+ 30% AP) (10 / 14 / 18 / 22 / 26 (+ 25% AP)Old)

That are some changes that would help Varus to find his way back into the Meta I think maybe boost some base stats like more AD at early lvls or something like that but for now this is everything :)
